location_working: Friday-Sunday, as well as in official public holidays, from 10.00 a.m. to the last guest
location_description: There are tables and cozy gazebos for 10, 20 and 40 people around the pond, surrounded by pine trees, as well as bridges for fishing.
location_description_1: The Club provides its guests with fishing rods and bait, and the restaurant is happy to cook the caught fish. Great fun without much arranging hassle.
